case.title: Male seeks Female - 50 (Lambeth)
case.text: Hi, ? My name is Vic. I am a black male living in the Lambeth area of London, 50 years old and a music producer, 5ft 6ins tall, short black hair. ex professional disc jockey, previously worked on monthly club contracts in countries like, Sweden, Denmark, Switzerland, Germany , Austria, Norway and London, would love to meet a nice female who is considerate, embraces compromise and very affectionate, No drama, completely stress free and easy going I consider myself normal straight and down to earth. no ex wife or ex girlfriends to complicate my life,if you are interested to know more about me, a simple e-mail would be fine, anything you would like to know, please ask OK..a good time is anytime. you can always contact me if and when its convenient OK, I will be happy to exchange emails with more details about myself. hoping to hear from you very soon Take care, Vic.
